Docs.summary: Represents a collection of Windows claims that are associated with an entity.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the Windows user identity specified by the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The claims representing the Windows groups to which this user belongs are added to the claim set.
The expiration time is set to 10 hours.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call the Dispose method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>. The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> in an unusable state. After calling the Dispose method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> occupied. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call the Dispose method before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>. Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> object's `Finalize` method.

Docs.summary: Gets the expiration time for this .

The URI of the right associated with the new claim.
Docs.summary: Searches for the claim that matches the specified claim type and rights in the .
Docs.returns: A object that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to specify the `claimType` parameter.
